backup_history_days.title: BackupHistoryDays controls how many days of backup history are retrieved.

collect_bufferpool_metrics.title: CollectBufferpoolMetrics toggles buffer pool efficiency metrics.

collect_bufferpools_matching.title: CollectBufferpoolsMatching filters buffer pools by name using glob patterns.

collect_connections_matching.title: CollectConnectionsMatching filters monitored connections by application ID.

collect_database_metrics.title: CollectDatabaseMetrics toggles high-level database status metrics.

collect_databases_matching.title: CollectDatabasesMatching filters databases by name using glob patterns.

collect_table_io_metrics.title: CollectTableIOMetrics enables table I/O statistics when available.

collect_table_metrics.title: CollectTableMetrics toggles table-level size and row metrics.

collect_tablespaces_matching.title: CollectTablespacesMatching filters tablespaces by name using glob patterns.

collect_wait_metrics.title: CollectWaitMetrics enables wait time statistics (locks, logs, I/O).

dsn.title: DSN provides a full DB2 connection string when manual control is required.

max_bufferpools.title: MaxBufferpools caps the number of buffer pools charted.

max_connections.title: MaxConnections caps the number of connection instances charted.

max_databases.title: MaxDatabases caps the number of databases charted.

max_db_conns.title: MaxDbConns limits the connection pool size.

max_db_life_time.title: MaxDbLifeTime forces pooled connections to be recycled after the specified duration.

max_indexes.title: MaxIndexes caps the number of indexes charted.

max_tables.title: MaxTables caps the number of tables charted.

max_tablespaces.title: MaxTablespaces caps the number of tablespaces charted.

timeout.title: Timeout controls how long DB2 RPCs may run before cancellation.

vnode.title: Vnode allows binding the collector to a virtual node.
